title: Game lags and doesn't let me reconnect
body: Hey there, for the last couple of days the game has been lagging on me all of a sudden on my first match, every day, always on the first match, and when I try to reconnect it won't let me reconnect, the game displays an error on the network issue. Please help!

replies.body: You may need to try adjusting a couple of your network settings in order to get a stronger connection with our servers. Most of the time tweaking your port forwarding and DNS settings will get you through a little better, and if you're not sure how to do those steps check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for help.

Hi, I already flushed DNS and renewed IP, I tried using the suggested DNS 8.8.8.8 and alternate DNS 8.8.4.4, and still get the same issues. After one or two games, the match lags, freezes and if I close the game and try reloading it, I start getting error messages until the match is over.

Thanks for the followup! There might be a bit of a bigger problem going on if that didn't help at all, so go ahead and hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure you attach your game/network logs [which you can grab using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool)] and attach those to your ticket!
